verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
FATHER, WE HAVE CONFIDENCE
By the blood of Jesus
To come into the place where You are,
To come into the place where You are.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
So, by the new and living way
We enter into the holy place;
We come to worship You with our hearts,
We come to worship You with all our hearts.
